SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.observer

Class ModelObservable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ModelObservable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChatHistory, Desk, Game, Lobby, Player
public abstract class ModelObservable extends Object
A model class can extends ModelObservable when it wants to be observable
